content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code earwarmer50 for 50% off the original price or use the code earwarmer100 for a free copy thank you for your support welcome to the cozy n cute earwarmer pattern this delightful earwarmer is the perfect blend of warmth comfort and style featuring a simple yet fun ribbed texture this pattern is both enjoyable to crochet and incredibly cozy to wear the design offers a snug fit that keeps your ears warm on chilly days making it the ideal accessory for fall and winter whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out this easy-to-follow pattern will have you crafting a beautiful earwarmer in no time get ready to make a cozy cute addition to your wardrobe this ear warmer is constructed from one end to the other and then the ends are crocheted together it is worked in half_double_crochet through the back loop to create the ribbed effect my samples were worked in size m this is a very beginner friendly pattern it uses basic stitches and includes a photo tutorial this pattern has written sizes for s m and l but it is easily adjusted to your size by working more or less row and reducing your starting stitch count there is a chart linked in the pattern to determine your size **finished measurements** small 18 medium 20 large 22 feel free to sell as many of the finished objects as you wish i ask that if you post on social media you would include a link to the pattern and give credit to me stopitharry on ravelry i will also provide pattern support so just message me on ravelry if you have any issues one thing that would be helpful to me as a newbie designer would be for you to rate the pattern when you are finished i would also love social media shares and pattern reviews in your notes thanks in advance i
